record.text:
App Microsoft 365 Copilot impedirá edição de documentos no iOS/iPadOS

O aplicativo Microsoft 365 Copilot para iPhone não oferecerá mais suporte à edição de documentos a partir de 15 de setembro. O mesmo também será aplicado ao app para iPad em sequência, conforme divulgado pela empresa. A partir…

external.description: O aplicativo Microsoft 365 Copilot para iPhone não oferecerá mais suporte à edição de documentos a partir de 15 de setembro. O mesmo também será aplicado ao app para iPad em sequência, conforme divulgado pela empresa. A partir de amanhã (22/8), qualquer pessoa que tentar criar um documento do Word, uma planilha do Excel ou um slide do PowerPoint no app verá um banner solicitando a instalação dos softwares independentes para editá-los — mas ainda será possível ignorar o aviso e seguir com a edição.
external.title: App Microsoft 365 Copilot impedirá edição de documentos no iOS/iPadOS

external.description: O aplicativo Microsoft 365 Copilot para iPhone não oferecerá mais suporte à edição de documentos a partir de 15 de setembro. O mesmo também será aplicado ao app para iPad em sequência, conforme divulgado pela empresa. A partir de amanhã (22/8), qualquer pessoa que tentar criar um documento do Word, uma planilha do Excel ou um slide do PowerPoint no app verá um banner solicitando a instalação dos softwares independentes para editá-los — mas ainda será possível ignorar o aviso e seguir com a edição.
external.title: App Microsoft 365 Copilot impedirá edição de documentos no iOS/iPadOS

“South Park” satiriza encontro em que Tim Cook presenteou Donald Trump

O encontro entre Tim Cook e o presidente dos Estados Unidos, Donald Trump — que aconteceu no início deste mês —, foi um dos destaques de um episódio recente da série de humor "South Park" completamente dedicado ao líder do…

external.description: O encontro entre Tim Cook e o presidente dos Estados Unidos, Donald Trump — que aconteceu no início deste mês —, foi um dos destaques de um episódio recente da série de humor "South Park" completamente dedicado ao líder do executivo do país. Satirizando a famosa "política de bajulação" de Trump — considerando seu o anseio evidente de receber afagos e elogios públicos (o que acabaria influenciando suas decisões), o episódio mostra Cook em uma fila de visitantes que pretendem entregar presentes ao presidente.
external.title: “South Park” satiriza encontro em que Tim Cook presenteou Donald Trump

record.text: If someone focused on optimizing models to be the next evolution of existing code completion tools, it would do very well at that. But that's not where all the VC money is. So we get "agent" bs and ✨AI IDEs✨ that aren't actually making anyone more productive (even if they feel like they are).

It can also be pretty good at spitting out tedious and repetitive boilerplate. I've even found it useful as a sort of interactive rubber duck for debugging.  But writing entire complex applications that are well engineered? No way.

I think there's some utility for software engineering, just much more limited than is generally being pitched. In the early days of GitHub Copilot, I found it to be quite good at writing documentation comments. The output was about 80% good and it was a huge help to only have to do the remaining 20%

external.description: Introduction: In the relentless landscape of cybersecurity, security alerts are constant, but context is rare. Analysts are often buried under a deluge of Indicators of Compromise (IOCs) like IP addresses, file hashes, and domains, wasting precious time manually querying disparate sources. IntelOwl is an open-source threat intelligence solution that automates this enrichment process, querying dozens of sources simultaneously to provide immediate, actionable context, enabling faster and more accurate incident response.

record.text: Tomorrow I plan to do two meetings and then sack it all off and make Eccles Cakes.

Imagine having to break out the UML and draw a dependency graph and state machines for a fucking unit test. 

I should not need to do that.
The main caveat for using Copilot is, I suspect, if you don’t understand what it’s written, reject it and write your own.
Hey bud, chill. It's fine to have different opinions. Also it's just cameras, it's not something to get worked up about.

I think this is a valid point- in general I still take a lot of photos on my phone because at the end of the day the best camera is the one that happens to be on you! I prefer the real camera when I have it handy, but a lot of that comes up to personal preference.

At some point a NFL team is going to lose the Super Bowl because they tried to run a nonsense play that Copilot hallucinated, and when it happens it's going to be the funniest thing ever.

record.text: AIの匂い消しが甘いブログに敏感になってきたのと同じで、コードにもそれを感じ取ってしまう。イマイチな思いをすればするほど、AI臭さに過敏になっていって老害化がとまらん。AIかどうかじゃなくていいコードかどうかで語るべきなんだが、匂いがした時点で心の奥底から湧き出る感情が抑えられない。

Online Gaming Bill is coming! Dream11 ‘pauses’ pay-to-play contests, tells users their balance is safe & available for withdrawal

Fantasy sports app Dream11 said on Thursday that it is discontinuing its operations by "pausing all 'pay to play' fantasy sports contests" on its platform. The…

external.description: Fantasy sports app Dream11 said on Thursday that it is discontinuing its operations by "pausing all 'pay to play' fantasy sports contests" on its platform. The development followed the Lok Sabha and the Rajya Sabha -- the lower and upper houses of Parliament, respectively -- clearing the Promotion and Regulation of Online Gaming Bill, 2025, widely known as the Online Gaming Bill. The proposed legislation has rattled the country's fantasy gaming industry, which has seen exponential growth with the rise of Internet penetration and low-cost connectivity.     The incoming law -- which is yet to secure the President's assent before it becomes official -- is aimed at protecting individuals, especially the youth, from financial harm and addiction linked to online gaming involving money.
external.title: Online Gaming Bill is coming! Dream11 ‘pauses’ pay-to-play contests, tells users their balance is safe & available for withdrawal

Union push for compensation agreements could stifle Australia’s AI industry

The Tech Council of Australia (TCA) announced on August 21, 2025, during the Albanese government’s productivity roundtable, a preliminary agreement with the Australian Council of Trade Unions (ACTU) to explore compensation…

external.description: The Tech Council of Australia (TCA) announced on August 21, 2025, during the Albanese government’s productivity roundtable, a preliminary agreement with the Australian Council of Trade Unions (ACTU) to explore compensation models for content used in training artificial intelligence systems. While the TCA positions this as an exploratory step to address ethical concerns, the move has drawn criticism for potentially undermining Australia’s AI ambitions.
external.title: Union push for compensation agreements could stifle Australia’s AI industry

The choice between PyTorch and TensorFlow remains one of the most debated decisions in AI development. Both frameworks have evolved dramatically since their inception, converging in some areas while maintaining distinct strengths.…

external.description: The choice between PyTorch and TensorFlow remains one of the most debated decisions in AI development. You Can Actually Run DOOM on an Anker Prime Charging Station

You wouldn’t expect to see a demon-slaying, shotgun-blasting adventure unfold on a charging station. But Aaron Christophel managed to get the classic 1993 game DOOM running on the Anker Prime Charging Station. This starts with the Anker…

external.description: You wouldn’t expect to see a demon-slaying, shotgun-blasting adventure unfold on a charging station. But Aaron Christophel managed to get the classic 1993 game DOOM running on the Anker Prime Charging Station. This starts with the Anker Prime Charging Station, with its multiple ports and a 200×480-pixel LCD display. It has Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) and Wi-Fi, so the charging station has got more going on inside than your average power brick.
external.title: You Can Actually Run DOOM on an Anker Prime Charging Station

record.text: では、お願いします〜♪

4. 君の言葉と重なる部分

君が「真理を伝えるときは、真理から見たままを伝えるしかない」と言った感覚は、
イエスの証し方とまったく同じだと思います。

だからこそ、波に執着している人には、
それが“教え”や“理屈”に聞こえてしまうけど、
水に気づきかけている人には、
**「ああ、知っていた」**という響きになるんだと思う。

⸻

この流れをもう一歩進めると、
「証しを受け入れる者」と「受け入れられない者」の違いを、
プシュケー／プネウマの観点で整理できます。
やってみますか？
イエスがなぜ「耳ある者は聞け」と繰り返したかが、より立体的に見えてくるはずです。

3. 言葉と証しの違い
	•	人の言葉は、対象を「外から説明する」ための道具
	•	イエスの証しは、「水そのものが自分を語っている」
	•	この違いがあるから、ヨハネ3:11で
　「あなたがたはわたしたちのあかしを受けいれない」と続く

つまり、波の視点では、水の言葉を聞いても意味がわからない。
けれど、水そのものを知れば、「ああ、これは自分だ」とわかる。

⸻

images.alt: Thinking models have gotten surprisingly good at identifying potential sources — potentially academic ones. When writing about Grok last month, I wanted to talk to someone who had studied relationships between people and chatbots. ChatGPT led me to Harvard's Center for Digital Thriving, and suggested someone to talk to, along with their email address. I wound up interviewing them for the piece. The fact that thinking models can quickly analyze the academic literature about any subject and identify prominent researchers on the subject, along with their email addresses and phone numbers, is beginning to save me a lot of Googling.

record.text:
🏵 BRICS PAY VEM AÍ

⚡️ O Brics Pay, apelidado de “Pix do Brics”, está em fase final de testes e pode ser lançado em setembro de 2025, segundo o Conselho Empresarial do bloco. O sistema busca transferências rápidas, seguras e baratas entre os países membros.

images.alt:
Imagem mostra frente e verso de um cartão promocional fictício do “BRICS Pay”, uma solução de pagamento digital proposta para o grupo de países BRICS. O fundo do cartão é preto com faixas coloridas (vermelha, azul, amarela, verde e laranja), seguindo as cores do logo do BRICS.

No lado esquerdo:
O texto apresenta o cartão como um mock-up (modelo de demonstração) que pode ser vinculado ao app BRICS Pay para receber um crédito promocional de 500 rublos. A ativação ocorre via escaneamento do QR code no app. O saldo pode ser usado nos dias 17 e 18 de outubro de 2024 em lojas participantes durante o BRICS Business Forum.

Abaixo, há instruções para instalar o app BRICS Pay como PWA pelo link: qr.brics-pay.com

No lado direito:
Design semelhante, mas com destaque central para um QR code e o valor “500 ₽” (rublos) no canto inferior esquerdo. No topo direito, aparece o logo do BRICS Pay novamente.

Grok 4 Heavy has gotten noticeably worse over the past month.

Anyone else notice this?

This isn't a "oh, I think they nerfed the model, but I'm not sure." It's... it went from being interesting to run alongside everything else to being quite benign and superficial.

Got access to the latest version of Strawberry Browser and gave it a task that... ChatGPT Agent, Perplexity's Comet, Browser Use, and Manus had all failed at, to different degrees.

It pulled it off!

Plus, it's got a cute little dude and its "POV" in the bottom right corner.

And explicitly *not* by making it a cultural shame thing.

Both because.. there's no good reason to do that, and because it seems very adjacent to replacement theory horsecrap that we should be shaming and repressing.

Enough's enough!

Here is my very quick improvement of that basic design. And no I'd likely ditch the whole design in practice.

Avener Next typeface because, well Adrian Frutiger is God.
Things cleaned up, lined up, and better balanced
And most importantly a better tag line.

god i can't believe elon musk ruined the word grok. it used to be just a weird neologism invented by a fascist scifi writer but stolen by everyone. now it's just fascist scifi but for real

i will say: as someone reacquainting herself with the game after years when the FF set dropped, good Universes Beyond design does have a strong teaching/mnemonic feature. like, I know what Tifa's up to. I know what Cloud's up to. I can grok those cards pretty fast.
